title: The Law of the Jungle
description: Henry Kadison is a shy farm boy from Nebraska who meets worldly millionaire playboy Blake Martin in a New York City nightclub. Coming from an extremely conservative background, Henry wants to experience all that New York City has to offer, and Blake would love to be his teacher.A short erotic m/m story that comes in at 7,000 words.
author: H.L. Holston
